name: kafka-connect
description: kafka-connect is a framework to move data via kafka

scripts.test: istanbul cover _mocha -- --recursive --timeout 12500 -R spec test/unit && istanbul check-coverage --statements 60
scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/unit && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Chris Froehlingsdorf <chris@5cf.de>
